page.title: 11 OTHER CHURCHES
page.content: The Highcliffe Methodist Church opened on the 19th of June 1963. The minister is the Rev. David Laidler and the church has seating for 270 people. It is brick built and is on Lymington Road. The Barton-on-Sea Methodist Church is in Sea Road. The present building is made of brick and was built in 1970. The minister is the Rev. T West. Cranemoor United Reform church is in Ringwood Road, Walkford. There has been a church on this spot for about 150 years. The present building is made of stone. It has a visiting minister which changes every week. The minister is the Rev. C. Lucraft. The Holy Redeemer Roman Catholic Church is in Kilmington Way. The priest is the Rev.T.Grundy. It was built in 1969 and is made of brick. By Matthew Kane
